fr.theshark34.openlauncherlib.launcher

Class GameLauncher

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.theshark34.openlauncherlib.launcher.GameLauncher

  • public class GameLauncher
extends java.lang.Object
    The Game Launcher

    The main class to launch the game with a game version and a game folder.
